page.title: 09VISIT TO PYLEIGH FARM (CONT)
page.content:
How many different types of animal are on the farm?
Mr. Day and his wife have Jersey cows, horses, mastiffs, bulls and a few chickens.
Describe the countryside around the farm :
It looks very green, lots of grassy fields and bits of woodland here and there. Some of the fields have crops in and others have been put out to pasture. Not much land is wasted here. In the distance wecould see a strange tower in Combe Wood. Mr. Day said it was a "folly" built by an eccentric Victorian.
